title: Important Update: ICAI Announces Online Assessment Test for Certificate Course on Derivatives on February 21, 2026!
content:
# Important Update: ICAI Announces Online Assessment Test for Certificate Course on Derivatives on February 21, 2026!

Ek important update hai for all CA members! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Certificate Course on Derivatives ke liye Online Assessment Test (AT) ki date announce kar di hai.

*   **Assessment Test Date:** The Online Assessment Test for the Certificate Course on Derivatives is scheduled for **Saturday, February 21, 2026**.
*   **Time:** The test will be conducted from 3:00 PM to 6:00 PM IST.
*   **Platform:** This assessment will be held through the ICAI Digital Learning Hub.
*   **Organized by:** The Committee on Financial Markets and Investors' Protection of ICAI is organizing this test.
*   **Notification Date:** This announcement was made via a notification dated February 4, 2026.

Candidates are advised to prepare well and ensure they meet all prerequisites for the online test.
